SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Teamcity URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Build Id" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Location to save" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Archive file name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!-----------------------------------------------------------Validation check starts----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
!Either provide both username and password or both can be empty : SET &COUNT# = 0
: IF &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# <> "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT#+1 : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD# <> "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT#+1 : ENDIF
: IF &COUNT# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "EITHER PROVIDE BOTH OR NONE OF THE INPUTS(USERNAME,PASSWORD)" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR# = "" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : ENDIF
! Validating Directory if not empty : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR# : SET &ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" cd /d "&ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR#" IF %ERRORLEVEL%==0 ( SET _WINDIR=%CD% ) ELSE ( SET ERRORS=%ERRORLEVEL% ECHO "ERROR: INVALID DIRECTORY LOCATION &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" ) IF %ERRORLEVEL%==0 ( IF %_WINDIR:~-1%==\ SET _WINDIR=%_WINDIR:~0,-1% ) : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" cd "&ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR#" errors=$? if [ "$errors" -eq "0" ] then unixdir=`pwd` if [ ! -w $unixdir ] then echo "ERROR: PERMISSION DENIED ON DIRECTORY &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" errors=1 fi else echo "ERROR: INVALID DIRECTORY LOCATION &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" errors=1 fi : ENDIF : ENDIF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
!Archive file name validation (It should not contain any dot) : SET &COUNT# = 0 : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#,".") : SET &COUNT# = &POS# + &COUNT# : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#,"/") : SET &COUNT# = &POS# + &COUNT# : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#,"\") : SET &COUNT# = &POS# + &COUNT#
: IF &COUNT# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "ARCHIVE FILE NAME SHOULD NOT CONTAIN (/ \ .)." : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : ENDIF
!---------------------------------------------------------Creating Artifact path--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = 0 ! Config Archive file : SET &FNAME#="" : IF &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME# EQ "" : SET &FNAME# = "buildarchive-&$RUNID#.zip" : ELSE : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME# : SET &FNAME# = STR_CAT("&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#", ".zip") : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Create cURL command to call Teamcity REST api--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &AUTH_TYPE# = "httpAuth"
: IF &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# EQ "" : IF &UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD# EQ "" : SET &AUTH_TYPE# = "guestAuth" : ENDIF : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = "curl -v "
! Teamcity url : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ENDPOINT_URL# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_URL#, "/&AUTH_TYPE#/app/rest/builds/id:&UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID#/artifacts/archived") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_ENDPOINT_URL# : SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#, " ""&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"" ")
: SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#, "--request GET --header 'accept:application/octet-stream' ")
! Username : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# : SET &ESC_USERNAME# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
! Password : IF &UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD# NE "" ! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Execute curl cmd based on AGENT OS-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ERROR_MSG# = "UNABLE TO CONNECT TO TEAMCITY. PLEASE CHECK INPUT PARAMETERS."
: IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" IF %ERRORS%==0 ( ECHO RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_FILE::=%_WINDIR%\&FNAME# echo "INFO: CURL CMD: &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#"
: IF &AUTH_TYPE# = "httpAuth" &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&ESC_USERNAME#:%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" --output "%_WINDIR%\&FNAME#" -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%%{http_code}\n" : ELSE &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# --output "%_WINDIR%\&FNAME#" -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%%{http_code}\n" : ENDIF )
IF NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 ( ECHO "ERROR: &UC4RB_TMC_ERROR_MSG#" SET ERRORS=%ERRORLEVEL% )
: ELSE
: IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" if [ "$errors" -eq "0" ] then : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# echo "INFO: CURL CMD: &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" echo "RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_FILE::=$unixdir/&FNAME#" : IF &AUTH_TYPE# = "httpAuth" &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&ESC_USERNAME#:$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" --output "$unixdir/&FNAME#" -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%{http_code}\n" : ELSE &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# --output "$unixdir/&FNAME#" -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%{http_code}\n" : ENDIF
if [ "$?" -gt "0" ] then echo "ERROR: &UC4RB_TMC_ERROR_MSG#" errors=$? fi fi : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF ! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** RETRIEVE ARTIFACT CMD EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** RETRIEVED ARTIFACT CMD FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
!Publish the artifact location :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:SET &RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_FILE# = "" :set &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# = "" :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_FILE" : SET &RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_FILE# = "&VALUE#" : ELSE : IF &KEY# EQ "UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# = &VALUE# : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
: IF &STATUS# = 0 : IF &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# NE "200" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="ERROR COMMUNICATING TEAMCITY." : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 : IF &RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_FILE# <> "" : SET &STATUS#=1 : PUBLISH &RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_FILE#,UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_PATH#,"TASK" : ENDIF : ELSE : PUBLISH &RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_FILE#,UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_PATH#,"TOP" : ENDIF : ELSE : IF &RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_FILE# <> "" : PUBLISH &RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_FILE#,UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_PATH#,"TASK" : ELSE : SET &STATUS#=0 : ENDIF : ENDIF : PUBLISH &STATUS#,,"TASK"
